title: Senior Web Developer — Kinetic Innovative Staffing
text: Kinetic Innovative Staffing is an AI-augmented remote staffing company with 1,182+ clients and 15,000+ roles filled, connecting businesses with dedicated offshore professionals from the Philippines across 20+ industries including IT, healthcare, finance, and construction.

title: Senior Software Engineer — BlastAsia, Inc.
text: BlastAsia is a software engineering and AI transformation company with 24 years in the industry, delivering custom web and mobile solutions for global enterprises, ISVs, and startups across finance, insurance, healthcare, retail, and logistics.

title: Software Developer Intern — Mr. Geek Mobile Solution Inc.
text: Mr. Geek is a web, mobile, and innovations solutions provider in the Philippines catering to Micro, Small, and Medium-scale Enterprises (MSMEs), with 8+ years of experience, 50+ clients served, and 30+ apps published. Official Philippine delegate at the Asian Entrepreneurship Award 2017 in Japan.
